definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Your willingness to sacrifice countless late nights consoling them?
sentences.chinese: 或者是因爲你願意花費無數的夜晚去安慰他們？

sentences.english: Partners are less likely to feel ignored or disrespected.
sentences.chinese: 同伴也不容易感到被忽視或者不受尊重。

sentences.english: Lie on your back with your legs spread or raise your knees to your head.
sentences.chinese: 平躺，張開雙腿或者把膝蓋擡到靠近頭部的地方。

sentences.english: They cant change a light bulb or without making a sketch.
sentences.chinese: 他們連燈泡都不會換，或者至少要先畫個草圖。

sentences.english: Or that double-digit interest rates dominated the 19th century?
sentences.chinese: 或者19世紀的利率以兩位數爲主？

sentences.english: Your lifejacket is located under your seat or beneath your central arm rest.
sentences.chinese: 你的救生衣裝在座位下或者中央扶手下面。

sentences.english: Resilience is not simply an individual characteristic or a psychological phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 適應力不單單是個體特徵或者心理現象。

sentences.english: There is no threat or force involved.
sentences.chinese: 它不涉及任何威脅或者武力。

sentences.english: This usually occurs during failure scenarios or periods of high load.
sentences.chinese: 這種景象經常產生在體系故障或者是高負荷的景象下。

sentences.english: Can you use lipstick on your eyes?
sentences.chinese: 把脣線筆當作眼線筆使用或者反一反？

sentences.english: Alternatively, you may ask the Clerk for an Execution form?
sentences.chinese: 或者，你可以問書記官要一份執行表格。

sentences.english: An elephant can uproot a tree or pick a flower without bruising a petal.
sentences.chinese: 大象能夠拔起大樹，或者摘下小花而不損傷花瓣。

sentences.english: Or have scientists been sexing up the risks and playing down the uncertainties?
sentences.chinese: 或者科學家對風險添油加醋，而貶低了不確定性？

sentences.english: If you have doubts, have it tested and/or get a Brita filter pitcher.
sentences.chinese: 如果你還擔心，測試下水質，或者買個純淨水過濾器。

sentences.english: Chronic conditions are managed equally well with chiropractic or yoga.
sentences.chinese: 慢性病通過脊神經療法或者瑜伽均可獲得顯著療效。

sentences.english: First of all, one should use Indian or Ceylonese tea.
sentences.chinese: 首先，你得用印度或者斯里蘭卡茶。

definition: some/a few/a little/(following an adjective) slightly ...er
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
